summary: Our Q&A report examines U.S. Coast Guard efforts to expand its polar icebreaker fleet. But can it afford to do so? The Coast Guard doesn't know—because it is: Building heavy polar icebreakers and planning for a new class of medium polar icebreakers, but has yet to determine the necessary mix of the two. So, it doesn't know how many of each it needs to build...
title: Coast Guard Acquisitions: Further Cost and Affordability Analysis of Polar Fleet Needed
